Body:
I have installed Balena OS in my linux system and flashed the image to memory of RaspberryPi. Connected the device to another monitor. Then in Balena dashboard I can see everything working fine except the Active Status" of device.

The device is not being connected to Dashboard of Balena. And with the device ID I have created in Application of Balena in Raspberry monitor with Balena OS it is asking for login and password. Whatever credentials of account I have given its showing login incorrect.

Error:efb4de login:wlan0:link is not ready
[ 681.580131]brcmfmac:power management diasabled

The above one is seen in monitor of RPi3

The below are the links I have followed for Installing Balena CLI and Balena OS:

[https://www.balena.io/os/docs/raspberrypi3/getting-started/][1] [https://www.balena.io/docs/learn/getting-started/raspberrypi3/python][1]/

"
Some spelling and punctuation, formatted quoted message
